product_name: Terramar Thermalator II Crew Top - Kids'
long_description: The Terramar Thermolator II crew top is a great base layer for cold-weather play. Soft and quick-drying polyester fabric with a brushed surface retains warmth, moves moisture away from the skin and dries quickly; antimicrobial treatment helps reduce odors. Fabric provides UPF 25 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Terramar Thermolator II crew top features spandex for stretch.
short_description: The Terramar Thermolator II crew top is a great base layer for cold-weather play.
